solution_line_template: If there are {spotted_brown_toads_per_acre} spotted brown toads per acre, and this represents one-quarter of the brown toads, then there are {spotted_brown_toads_per_acre}*{quarter_multiplier}=<<{spotted_brown_toads_per_acre}*{quarter_multiplier}={total_brown_toads_per_acre}>>{total_brown_toads_per_acre} brown toads per acre.

If for every {brown_toads_per_green_toad} brown toads there is one green toad, then there are {total_brown_toads_per_acre}/{brown_toads_per_green_toad}=<<{total_brown_toads_per_acre}/{brown_toads_per_green_toad}={green_toads_per_acre}>>{green_toads_per_acre} green toads per acre.
